Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

F32

The basic type F32 describes a standard 32-bit floating-point number.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_3D_distance_factor, AIL_3D_doppler_factor, AIL_3D_orientation, AIL_3D_position, AIL_3D_rolloff_factor, AIL_3D_sample_cone, AIL_3D_sample_distances, AIL_3D_sample_effects_level, AIL_3D_sample_obstruction, AIL_3D_sample_occlusion, AIL_3D_velocity, AIL_DLS_get_reverb, AIL_DLS_set_reverb, AIL_quick_set_reverb, AIL_sample_reverb, AIL_set_3D_distance_factor, AIL_set_3D_doppler_factor, AIL_set_3D_orientation, AIL_set_3D_position, AIL_set_3D_rolloff_factor, AIL_set_3D_sample_cone, AIL_set_3D_sample_distances, AIL_set_3D_sample_effects_level, AIL_set_3D_sample_obstruction, AIL_set_3D_sample_occlusion, AIL_set_3D_velocity, AIL_set_3D_velocity_vector, AIL_set_sample_reverb, AIL_set_stream_reverb, AIL_stream_reverb, AIL_update_3D_position
